sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import './checkout.styles.scss' import {connect} from 'react-redux'; import {createStructuredSelector} from 'reselect'; import {selectCartItems,selectCartTotal} from '../../redux/cart/cart.selector' import CheckoutItem from '../../components/collection-item/collection-item.component' const checkoutPage=({cartItems, total}) => (
Product
Description
Price
Price
Remove
{ cartItems.map(cartItem => ) }
TOTAL : ${total}
) const mapStateToProps = createStructuredSelector({ cartItems:selectCartItems, total:selectCartTotal }) export default connect(mapStateToProps)(checkoutPage);
